scripts.mcp-cli: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/list
scripts.mcp-tools-list: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/list
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_list_metrics: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_list_metrics
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_query: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_query  --tool-arg metric=Зарядка --tool-arg range="last 7d"
scripts.mcp-tool-activity_aggregate: npx --yes --package @modelcontextprotocol/inspector mcp-inspector --cli npm run mcp-server -- --method tools/call --tool-name activity_aggregate  --tool-arg metric=Зарядка --tool-arg range="last 30d" --tool-arg agg=mean
